original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa

original: Dhammapaccanīyānuloma (4), Dukadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (6)
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma duka duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: 24.19. Saraṇaduka, Cūḷantaraduka
analyzed: saraṇaduka cūḍantaraduka

original: Nasaraṇo nasappaccayo dhammo araṇassa sappaccayassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Ārammaṇe ekaṁ, adhipatiyā upanissaye ekaṁ.
analyzed: na saraṇaḥ na sappaccayaḥ dhammaḥ araṇassa sappaccayassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ saṅkhitta ārammaṇe eka adhipatiyā upanissaye eka

original: Nasaraṇo nasaṅkhato dhammo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na saraṇaḥ na saṅkhataḥ dhammo

original: Nasaraṇaṁ nasanidassanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo sanidassano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na saraṇam na sanidassanam dhammam paṭicca araṇaḥ sanidassanaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe vipāke ekam pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nasaraṇo naanidassano dhammo saraṇassa anidassanassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena
analyzed: na saraṇaḥ na anidassanaḥ dhammaḥ saraṇassa anidassanassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena

original: paccayo. Nasaraṇo naanidassano dhammo araṇassa anidassanassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena
analyzed: paccayaḥ na saraṇaḥ na anidassanaḥ dhammaḥ araṇassa anidassanassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena

original: paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā ekaṁ, upanissaye purejāte atthiyā avigate dve.
analyzed: paccayo saṅkhitta ārammaṇe dve adhipatiyā eka upanissaye purejāte atthiyā avigate dve

original: Nasaraṇaṁ nasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo sappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na saraṇam na sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca araṇaḥ sappaṭighaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… aññamaññe ekaṁ …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe aññamaññe ekam pe vipāke ekam pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nasaraṇaṁ naappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo appaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: na saraṇam na appaṭigham dhammam paṭicca araṇaḥ appaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā eka adhipatiyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Nasaraṇaṁ narūpiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo rūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naaraṇaṁ
analyzed: na saraṇam na rūpim dhammam paṭicca araṇaḥ rūpī dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā na araṇa

original: narūpiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo rūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā
analyzed: na rūpim dhammam paṭicca araṇaḥ rūpī dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā

original: dve, adhipatiyā dve …pe… aññamaññe ekaṁ …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate dve.
analyzed: dve adhipatiyā dve pe aññamaññe ekam pe vipāke ekam pe avigate dve

original: Nasaraṇaṁ naarūpiṁ dhammaṁ paccayā saraṇo arūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasaraṇaṁ
analyzed: na saraṇam na arūpim dhammam paccayā saraṇaḥ arūpī dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā na saraṇa

original: naarūpiṁ dhammaṁ paccayā araṇo arūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na arūpim dhammam paccayā araṇaḥ arūpī dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā dve …pe… avigate dve.
analyzed: hetuyā dve pe avigate dve

original: Nasaraṇaṁ nalokiyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: na saraṇam na lokiyam dhammam paṭicca araṇaḥ lokiyaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā eka adhipatiyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Nasaraṇaṁ nalokuttaraṁ dhammaṁ paccayā araṇo lokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: na saraṇam na lokuttaram dhammam paccayā araṇaḥ lokuttaraḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Nasaraṇaṁ nakenaci viññeyyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo kenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: na saraṇam na kenacid viññeyyam dhammam paṭicca araṇaḥ kenacid viññeyyaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe dve pe vipāke ekam pe avigate pañca

original: Nasaraṇaṁ nakenaci naviññeyyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo kenaci naviññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: na saraṇam na kenacid na viññeyyam dhammam paṭicca araṇaḥ kenacid na viññeyyaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe dve pe vipāke ekam pe avigate pañca
